name: Konecranes Plc
goal: Konecranes is a world-leading group of Lifting Businesses™, serving a broad range of customers, including manufacturing and process industries, shipyards, ports and terminals. Konecranes provides productivity enhancing lifting solutions as well as services for lifting equipment of all makes.
euInitiatives: EU initiatives in the field of Legislation, digitalization, IoT, transport and environment
